name: Save new Base.comÂ orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new order is created in Base.com, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yGYB6mOdGQL8ZJUSVcQ9dzJTPJYyI3zVoCnjA_VABic/edit?usp=sharing)
